entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as reacting to Snape being given the Defence Against the Dark Arts job. He is described as staring up at the staff table and incensed.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as being given the Defence Against the Dark Arts job, which Harry is upset about. He is described as sitting on Dumbledore's right and raising a hand in lazy acknowledgement of applause from the Slytherin table.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as not trusting Snape to teach Defence Against the Dark Arts. He is also described as sitting at the staff table with Snape on his right.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is mentioned as being thought by Harry to be teaching Defence Against the Dark Arts, but it is later revealed that this was not confirmed by Dumbledore.

entities.name: slytherin table
entities.description: The Slytherin table is mentioned as applauding Snape when his name is mentioned.

relationships.description: Harry dislikes Snape and is upset about him being given the Defence Against the Dark Arts job.
Dumbledore does not trust Snape to teach Defence Against the Dark Arts.
